menu_wow_rude_desc: Complains automatically whenever anyone murders a surrendering/dominated cop.
menu_wow_rude_isEnabled_desc: Check to automatically complain whenever anyone kills a surrendering cop
menu_wow_rude_hostOnly_desc: If checked, 'Wow Rude' will ONLY complain if you are hosting.
menu_wow_rude_nameAndShame_desc: If checked, 'Wow Rude' will name the culprit. Even if the culprit was you.
menu_wow_rude_complainCivilians_desc: If checked, 'Wow Rude' will complain about civilians getting murdered as well.
menu_wow_rude_usePrefix_desc: If enabled, Wow Rude's messages will be prefixed with a >:(. Turn this off to disable the prefixing
menu_wow_rude_complainHandsUp_desc: If checked, Wow Rude will complain about cops killed during the first step of the surrendering process (with their hands up)
menu_wow_rude_shuffle_desc: If checked, Wow Rude will use random responses from the appropriate file rather than going through the responses in order
menu_wow_rude_logging_desc: you don't need to worry about this.
menu_wow_rude_logStuff_desc: Whether or not to log debug info
menu_wow_rude_logInChat: Log debug info in the chat
menu_wow_rude_logInChat_desc: Whether or not to log debug info into the chat (will only be visible to you). Please don't turn this on, unless you want to be flooded with useless info
menu_wow_rude_logInLogs_desc: Whether or not to log debug info in your BLThook logs. Please don't turn this on, unless you want them to be flooded with useless info
menu_wow_rude_minLogInChat: Minimum importance for messages to be logged in the chat
menu_wow_rude_minLogInChat_desc: This is here for debug purposes (and my sanity) only. Don't bother touching this yourself.
menu_wow_rude_minLogInLogs: Minimum importance for messages to be logged in the BLThook logs
menu_wow_rude_minLogInLogs_desc: This is here for debug purposes (and my sanity) only. Don't bother touching this yourself.
menu_wow_rude_ignoreNPCs_desc: If checked, 'Wow Rude' will ignore kills made by NPCs.
